proposal1.heroHeadline: KBD spends over 1,200 hours a year on proposals. Here's how to reclaim that time.
proposal1.heroSubheadline: Creating proposals manually bleeds time. With our system, generate them in 47 seconds, tailored to your marketing services.
proposal1.problemsIntro: KBD's current proposal process is a constant drain on resources.

problems.title: Time Drain
problems.description: Each proposal takes over 10 hours. That's time not spent on client acquisition or campaign innovation.

problems.title: Lost Deals
problems.description: Delays in proposal delivery lead to lost opportunities. Every delayed hour risks a client choosing a competitor.

problems.title: Brand Inconsistency
problems.description: Manual creation leads to inconsistent branding. This inconsistency can confuse clients and dilute KBD's market positioning.

problems.title: High Labor Costs
problems.description: Proposals require significant manpower. This translates to over $50,000 annually in labor costs that could be redirected.

problems.title: Inefficient Follow-ups
problems.description: Tracking proposal engagement manually is cumbersome, delaying follow-up actions. This slows down your sales cycle.

problems.title: Stress and Burnout
problems.description: Continuous manual proposal crafting leads to team fatigue. It reduces productivity across other vital marketing efforts.

proposal1.solutionIntro: Our AI system replaces all these inefficiencies with precision and speed.

solutions.title: Instant Proposal Generation
solutions.description: Currently, proposals take hours to draft manually. Our system creates them in under 60 seconds, allowing more time to win clients.

solutions.title: Consistent Branding
solutions.description: Manual processes lead to branding errors. Our AI ensures every proposal aligns with KBD's brand standards.

solutions.title: Automated Tracking
solutions.description: Tracking proposal engagement is currently manual and slow. Our system automates this, enabling timely and informed follow-ups.

solutions.title: Reduced Labor Costs
solutions.description: Crafting proposals is labor-intensive. Our system reduces the need for extra manpower, saving costs significantly.

solutions.title: Enhanced Team Productivity
solutions.description: Manual proposal crafting causes stress and burnout. Our system frees up the team to focus on strategic marketing initiatives.

proposal1.whyUsIntro: Four reasons this works. Not marketing claims. Engineering facts.

whyUsCards.title: Speed
whyUsCards.description: Every hour your team spends writing proposals is an hour not spent closing deals. This system gives those hours back. Lead data in, live proposal out, 60 seconds.

whyUsCards.title: Personalization
whyUsCards.description: Generic proposals get ignored. Personalized proposals close. The system reads each prospect's website and reflects their services, tone, and positioning back to them. Written from scratch, not templated.

whyUsCards.title: Ownership
whyUsCards.description: No monthly subscription bleeding your budget. No vendor deciding to raise prices or shut down. You own the source code, the infrastructure, and the data. Permanently.

whyUsCards.title: Support
whyUsCards.description: Personal onboarding, a video walkthrough your team can reference anytime, and one week of post-delivery support. You are not left figuring this out alone.

fearCards.title: You are probably thinking: our stack is complicated.
fearCards.sub: CRM, email, Sheets, Slack. The system connects to whatever you already use. No migration.

fearCards.title: You might be wondering if this breaks your current workflow.
fearCards.sub: It runs alongside everything you have. Nothing changes except the time you spend on proposals.

fearCards.title: You are concerned the output will not match your standards.
fearCards.sub: Revisions are part of the build. We configure, test, and refine until the output matches your bar exactly.

proposal1.teamIntro: Your point of contact. No handoffs, no account managers, no layers.

team.name: Ayush Chauhan
team.bio: Full-stack engineer specializing in AI automation for agencies and service businesses. Every engagement personally handled from architecture through deployment. 15+ systems built. Zero failed deliveries. Works async, ships fast.

proposal1.processIntro: What Working With Us Looks Like

process.title: Kickoff (Async or Call)
process.description: We map your workflow, services, and current proposal process. Can be a 15-minute call or handled entirely over email. By the end, we have everything needed to configure the system.

process.title: System Configuration
process.description: The engine gets configured with your services, pricing structure, tone of voice, and brand standards. Every proposal it generates will sound like your best strategist wrote it.

process.title: Build and QA
process.description: Test proposals generated and reviewed against your quality bar. Refinements continue until the output is indistinguishable from what your team produces manually.

process.title: Deployment and Handoff
process.description: Deployed to production with full infrastructure. You receive a video walkthrough, documentation, and complete source code. From this point, the system runs without us.

proposal1.pricingIntro: Two options. Both are one-time builds. No subscriptions, no recurring fees. You own the source code and infrastructure permanently.

pricing.name: Proposal Engine
pricing.subtitle: // Core System
pricing.description: Custom proposal automation configured for KBD's services, voice, and pricing structure.

pricing.name: Engine + AI Chatbot
pricing.subtitle: // Recommended
pricing.description: Everything above, plus an AI sales assistant embedded in every proposal. Handles objections, answers questions, and books calls for KBD around the clock.
features: AI chatbot on every proposal page

proposal1.ctaHeadline: See this running on your actual proposals.
proposal1.ctaDescription: Reply here or email Ayush directly. He will send the onboarding form. Takes about 10 minutes and the build starts the same day. Custom-configured for KBD.

proposal2.heroHeadline: Transform Acme Corp's Reach with KBD's Proven Marketing Strategies.
proposal2.heroSubheadline: Let's enhance your digital presence and convert more visitors into loyal customers. Our customized plan ensures measurable growth.
proposal2.problemsIntro: Every missed opportunity is a loss in potential revenue for Acme Corp.

problems.title: High Bounce Rate
problems.description: Every visitor who leaves your site without engaging is potential revenue lost. Currently, your bounce rate exceeds 70%, translating to thousands in lost sales monthly.

problems.title: Low Conversion Rate
problems.description: A conversion rate below 2% means you're losing more than 98% of potential customers. This results in significant revenue loss each quarter.

problems.title: Ineffective Ad Spend
problems.description: Without precise targeting, your ad spend does not generate optimal ROI. This inefficiency could cost you over $10,000 annually in wasted ad spend.

problems.title: Weak Brand Visibility
problems.description: Limited brand recognition means missed opportunities for customer engagement, leading to an estimated 20% lower market penetration.

problems.title: Poor Customer Retention
problems.description: Low retention rates indicate that 30% of customers do not return, equating to substantial recurring revenue loss.

problems.title: Unoptimized SEO
problems.description: Without effective SEO strategies, you're invisible to potential customers. This invisibility results in a 40% decrease in organic traffic.

proposal2.solutionIntro: Our strategies directly address these challenges to unlock Acme Corp's full potential.

solutions.title: Website Optimization
solutions.description: We enhance user experience to reduce bounce rate and increase engagement. This leads to higher conversion rates.

solutions.title: Targeted Advertising
solutions.description: Our precise targeting improves ad spend efficiency, ensuring maximum ROI and customer acquisition.

solutions.title: SEO Enhancement
solutions.description: We boost your search rankings to increase visibility, driving more organic traffic to your site.

solutions.title: Brand Strategy
solutions.description: We strengthen brand identity and visibility, ensuring greater market penetration and customer loyalty.

proposal2.whyUsIntro: KBD is your strategic partner, delivering results with precision and expertise.

whyUsCards.title: Tailored Solutions
whyUsCards.description: Our services are customized to meet your specific needs and objectives.

whyUsCards.title: Dedicated Support
whyUsCards.description: We provide continuous support to ensure your goals are met efficiently.

whyUsCards.title: Proven Results
whyUsCards.description: Our strategies are backed by data and a track record of success.

whyUsCards.title: Expert Team
whyUsCards.description: Our team consists of seasoned professionals with industry expertise.

proposal2.teamIntro: Our team is dedicated to your success.

team.name: Kevin Brown
team.bio: Kevin leads the strategic direction and manages key client relationships, ensuring results-driven outcomes.

proposal2.processIntro: What Working With Us Looks Like

process.title: Discovery
process.description: We analyze your current strategies and identify opportunities.

process.title: Strategy Development
process.description: We develop a comprehensive plan tailored to your needs.

process.title: Implementation
process.description: We execute the plan with precision and attention to detail.

process.title: Optimization & Reporting
process.description: We refine our approach based on results and provide detailed reports.
